Día a día David trabaja como estibador en una granja de aves, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día, ya que se levanta desde muy temprano para ir a su centro de labores ya que es muy responsable, por ello el cree que le va bien en su trabajo, por su responsabilidad y su honrades.

David está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran ayuda el podrá comprar mercadería para iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa para damas caballeros y niños, para que su esposa pueda tener un ingreso y poder apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar, así podrá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.

loans.use: Para compra de mercaderia (ropa para damas,caballeros y niños)

loans.name: Celedonio

texts.en:
Mr. Celedonio sells ice cones, and fruit cocktails, on his tricycle in the summertime. And then in the winter, he sells tamales and hot chocolate. He already has 9 years of experience doing this.

Mr. Celedonio would like to buy another, better, tricycle because he knows the city very well and knows where to go to sell his food. This is why he is thrilled with the idea of buying a second tricycle, and this way he will be able to have help in selling his food. This will increase his sales and income, and he will feel empowered to improve his family conditions.

Mr.Celedonio is asking for a loan of $900.00. He will invest this money in a tricycle and some ingredients.

Español

El Sr. Celedonio vende durante el verano en su triciclo raspados de hielo y ensaladas de fruta. Durante el invierno vende tamales y el chocolate caliente. Él tiene ya 9 años de experiencia en este giro. A El Sr. Celedonio le encantaria comprar otro triciclo porque conoce muy bien la ciudad y sabe donde vender su producto. Esta es la razón por la cual esta emocionado con la idea de comprar un segundo triciclo, y de esta manera él podrá tener ayuda extra en la venta . Esto aumentará sus ventas y su ingreso y con esto mejoraran sus condiciones familiares. El Sr.Celedonio está solicitandoun préstamo de USD$900.00.pagaderos en un plazo de 6 a 12 meses el dinero sera invertido en un triciclo y para la compra de ingredientes. De antemano, gracias por tu ayuda.

loans.use: Buy another tricycle and ingrdients

loans.name: Ismayil

texts.en: Ismayil is local resident and is doing a business in Beylagan market. He is doing this business since 2005. As soon as he rented a booth in the market place he applied to Normicro Beylagan branch and borrowed the first loan in amount of $500. He borrowed three loans with the last one amounting to $700. Now he is in need of $1000 to increase the stock of goods and expand the business.

loans.use: To expand the business

loans.name: Sii

texts.en: Sii M. is a 40-year old single mother.  Her biological son is grown, but she has adopted three additional children from relatives who had no means to support them.  Sii works very hard running a small taro plantation to support all of her children.  She sells her produce to area hotels.  Her kindness has helped her to build a good relationship with her customers, and she is very focused on keeping them them satisfied.  Her main goal is to provide for her children, and she is passionate about providing them all a good education and future full of opportunities.

loans.use: To buy chain link fence, timbers and tools

loans.name: Glenda Yamileth

texts.en: I have been selling seasoning for cooking for 3 years. I generally purchase large quantities so that I can package and sell them individually to neighbors and markets. I need buy more and increase my profits. I need your help.

loans.use: To sell cooking seasonings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy raw materials like aluminum and panels

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en: Luisa is a 51 year old mother of 5 children. Luisa and her family have had a plantation for ages. After working hard for many years, they also now own a cocoa and nonu plantation. This is Luisa's second loan, she is very thankful for the chance to improve the standard of living for her family. Luisa will spend the loan to buy weed-killing fertilizers, and other supplies for her plantation. She plans to expand her nonu plantation because it is in high demand.

loans.use: To buy weed-killing chemicals, fertilizers, and other supplies for her plantation

loans.name: Khiev

texts.en: Mrs. Khiev T., age 47, works with her husband on her plantation growing crops, making around $4 each day. They have five children: three are employed at garment factory and two are students. She would like to request a loan of $500 in order to purchase a cow to help her plow her field. This will lead to a greater output of crops and increase the family’s income.

loans.use: To purchase a cow to pull a plow on the farm.

loans.name: Isabel Manuel

texts.pt:
Isabel Manuel S., resident of the Maxaquene neighborhood, is married with three children. She is entering her third loan cycle. She sells chairs, basins, buckets, and plastic containers. She will borrow 15000 meticais, to pay back in eight months. She sells her goods in the Xiquelene market. With these funds, she will invest in her business.

Translated from Portuguese by Ilse Ackerman, Kiva volunteer.

Isabel Manuel S., residente no bairro da Maxaquene, portadora do BI nº 100176798E, vive maritalmente , tem 3 filhos esta no 3º ciclo vende cadeiras , bacias, baldes, cestos plasticos, vai tomar o valor de 15000 mt para pagar em 8 meses vende no mercado Xiquelene com o valor ela vai investir no negocio.

loans.use: Increase her business

loans.name: Jestina

texts.en: Jestina is 35 years old and is married with 3 children.  She started her small grocery business 2 years ago in the market of Makeni town in Sierra Leone.  Before the loans, she was selling the goods by the roadside of the town.  This helped Jestina to acquire a space in the market where she does the selling, and her business increased and diversified.  Jestina is requesting additional capital in the amount of $350 to further expand her business.

loans.use: Jestina has been able to nurture her business to success, and now she needs a loan to make it more sustainable.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
For 7 years Blanca has been in charge of a business she inherited from her father. Although she felt very young, she took the reins of a small general store. She's had a lot of difficulty trying to diversify the products she offers. Before the father died, his illness generated a lot of costs, and so she was not able to invest sufficiently in the products and basic everyday items which are always in demand by the local people. Her husband is in charge of the household costs. He works as a driver and his salary enables him to cover basic services. Blanca runs the business, takes care of their young son and maintains the house. She is requesting a loan to stock the store with basic grains, meat, dairy products and other items. With more stock, she will be able to grow her business and improve the quality of life for her family.

Blanca hace 7 años se hizo cargo del negocio que su padre le heredó, siendo muy joven tomo las riendas de la pulpería, la cual ha tenido mucha dificultad en diversificar los productos que ofrece, antes de la muerte de su padre la enfermedad de este le generó grandes gastos, por lo cual no ha podido invertir suficiente en la compra de productos y alimentos básicos, los cuales son muy demandados por los pobladores de su zona, ya que estos compran los alimentos que consumirán día con día. Su esposo se encarga de los gastos de la casa, se desempeña como conductor y su salario le permite subsanar ciertos servicios básicos, la señora atiende el negocio, cuida de su pequeño hijo y realiza los quehaceres del hogar. En estos momentos la señora solicita un préstamo para abastecer su pulpería de granos básicos, carne, productos lácteos, y perecederos. Es así como podrá ampliar su negocio y mejorar la condición habitacional en la que se encuentra.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO STOCK HER SMALL STORE WITH RICE, SUGAR, OIL, MEAT AND DAIRY PRODUCTS, EXPANDING THE VARIETY OF ITEMS SHE OFFERS AND GROWING HER BUSINESS.

loans.name: Marta Elena

texts.es:
Marta Elena R. has 6 kids who are all studying in the county school of Achuapa, in the city of Leon. That is also where they live, in their own home. Mrs R. has been a farmer since she was young, sewing seeds, harvesting them and then selling them, and this is her and her kids' only form of income.

Her only worry at the moment is that she needs some financial resources as in their village there is no electricity and they have therefore got a solar panal, but she needs to pay for it at this time. This is why she has asked Ceprodel for a loan so that she can pay her way and use the panal for the needs of her household and for her kids' education, which is what she cares about most.

Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

Marta Elena R. es madre de seis hijos todos estudiantes de un colegio del municipio de Achuapa de la ciudad de León que es donde ellos viven en un hogar propio. La señora R. se dedica desde muy joven al negocio de agricultura sembrando semillas y luego al momento de la siega la recoge y la comercializa siendo este su único ingreso con el que mantiene su hogar y a sus hijos.

Su preocupación actualmente es la necesidad de obtener recursos económicos debido a que en su localidad no cuenta con energía eléctrica y para ello ha adquirido un panel solar que tiene la responsabilidad de pagar en estos próximos días. Por este motivo ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con crédito que le de la oportunidad de saldar su cuenta y utilizar el panel para los quehaceres del hogar y el estudio de sus hijos que son lo que mas quiere según comenta.

loans.use: To pay for a solar panel/Pago de panel solar

loans.name: Francis Raquel

texts.es:
Francis is 34 years old, married, and lives in the Riguero neighborhood. She has a one year old son. She has had her convenience store business for 4 years. She began selling in the market then was able to relocate the business to her own home. With the loan she wants to buy more products as sometimes her sales are low because she doesn’t have enough inventory to offer her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

La Sra. Francis tiene 34 años de edad casada habita en el barrio Riguero tiene un niño de un año, su negocio es una pulpería con 4 años de tenerla ella comenzó vendiendo en el mercado oriental lo cual logro ubicarlo en su propia casa el préstamo lo quiere para comprar mas inventario ya que a veces sus ventas son bajas por no tener todo lo necesario para ofrecer a sus clientes.

loans.use: Buy products to expand her store's inventory

loans.name: Sugran

texts.en: Sugran Baji is a wife of a milkman named Mr. H.. She is the mother of three children:  two sons and one daughter. Her sons are married. Her husband is the owner of 11 buffaloes. Her daily income is $20. Her husband has been in this profession since his childhood. Her son runs a motorbike shop, where he rents motorbikes. Sugran Baji helps her husband in selling milk. She goes to the market and sells the milk in a shop. She is applying for a loan for her husband. She wants to invest that amount in her husband's business and wants to hire some employees to help him in his work.

loans.use: Expand the milk business

loans.name: Rosa Idalia Del Carm's Group

texts.es: Hola mi nombre es Rosa Idalia del Carmen E., me dedico a la venta de productos de consumo popular cuanto con un pequeño negocio ubicado en mi casa de habitacion en el centro de la ciudad, tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de actividad la que me genera ingresos para cubrir con los compromisos  con los proveedores y cubrir con los gastos familiares, soy madre soltera, tengo un hijo que es lo mas preciado para mi, el esta cursando el plan basico en el Centro Basico Escolar de mi ciudad, actualmente necesito ayuda monetaria para surtir mi negocio y poder atender la demanda existente y tambien tener una mejor ganancia ya que la situacion en nuestro pais es dificil para nosotros los pobres.

loans.use: compra de granos basicos como ser arroz, frijoles, maiz,  azucar, manteca, aceite, sal, enbutidos, lacteos, jabon, pastas dentales.

loans.name: Kuvondik

texts.ru:
Kuvondik T. lives in the J. Rumy region. He is 47 years old, is married and has 6 children. He has a high school education. For more than 23 years now he has been working in agriculture. Kuvondik loves his job very much, every year he collects two harvests on his plot of land. This business is the sole source of income for his large and happy family. He uses some of the harvest for his family and sells the rest at the market. He would like to take out a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Тагайназаров Кувондик Гулмахмадович житель района Румй.Возраст 47 лет , женат , имеет 6 детей.Образование среднее. Вот уже более 23 лет клиент занимается сельским хозяйством. Кувондик очень любит свою работу, каждый год на своем земельном участке он собирает по 2 урожая.Этот вид деятельности является единственным источником дохода его большой и дружной семьи. Нужное он использует в нуждах своей семьи , а остальной урожай реализует на рынке. В данный момент клиент хочет купить семена и минеральные удобрения для получения

loans.use: Purchase seeds and fertilizer
